All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
CoordFloatMapSerializer
Serializer for CoordFloatMap; needs CoordSerializer registered for Coord.
CoordFloatOrderedMapSerializer
Serializer for CoordFloatOrderedMap; needs CoordSerializer registered for Coord.
CoordObjectMapSerializer
Serializer for CoordObjectMap; needs CoordSerializer registered for Coord, and a serializer registered for whatever Object type the Map has for its values.
CoordObjectOrderedMapSerializer
Serializer for CoordObjectOrderedMap; needs CoordSerializer registered for Coord, and a serializer registered for whatever Object type the Map has for its values.
CoordOrderedSetSerializer
Serializer for CoordOrderedSet; needs CoordSerializer registered for Coord.
CoordSerializer
A serializer for everybody's favorite immutable pair of ints, Coord! Doesn't need anything else registered.
CoordSetSerializer
Serializer for CoordSet; needs CoordSerializer registered for Coord.
CyclicNoiseSerializer
Serializer for CyclicNoise; doesn't need anything else registered.
FlanNoiseSerializer
Serializer for FlanNoise; doesn't need anything else registered.
HighDimensionalValueNoiseSerializer
Serializer for HighDimensionalValueNoise; doesn't need anything else registered.
LightingManagerSerializer
Needs int[], int[][], float[], float[][], CoordSerializer for Coord, CoordObjectOrderedMapSerializer for CoordObjectOrderedMap, RegionSerializer for Region, and RadianceSerializer for Radiance to be registered.
NoiseAdjustmentSerializer
Serializer for NoiseAdjustment; needs whatever INoise implementation this uses to be registered as well.
NoiseSerializer
Serializer for Noise; doesn't need anything else registered.
NoiseWrapperSerializer
Serializer for NoiseWrapper; needs whatever INoise implementation this uses to be registered as well.
PhantomNoiseSerializer
Serializer for PhantomNoise; doesn't need anything else registered.
RadianceSerializer
Serializer for Radiance; doesn't need anything else registered.
RegionSerializer
Serializer for Region; does not need any other classes to be registered, although registering Coord with CoordSerializer is a good idea.
SimplexNoiseScaledSerializer
Serializer for SimplexNoiseScaled; doesn't need anything else registered.
SimplexNoiseSerializer
Serializer for SimplexNoise; doesn't need anything else registered.
SpatialMapSerializer
Serializer for SpatialMap; needs the type of the SpatialMap's values registered.
TaffyNoiseSerializer
Serializer for TaffyNoise; doesn't need anything else registered.
ValueNoiseSerializer
Serializer for ValueNoise; doesn't need anything else registered.
